signatory_informations_description: You need to accept the Microsoft Customer Agreement to get your licence(s). Please check that the signatory’s details are correct.
signatory_informations_message: By clicking “Confirm”, you will be redirected to the Microsoft website to finalise your request. Once you have confirmed, close the tab, then return to this configuration tunnel.
signatory_step2_description: Before we can start providing the service, you need to confirm that you have signed a contract with Microsoft.
signatory_step2_button: I have signed a Microsoft contract
signatory_success_message: Your service has been delivered and is now available!
